Class ReservationSystem

java.lang.Object
ReservationSystem
public class ReservationSystem extends Object
The ReservationSystem class represents the main reservation system in the hotel reservation system. It contains a collection of hotels through which a user can reserve/book a room.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private ArrayList<Hotel>
    hotelList
    Collection of hotels stored in the system.
    private Scanner
    sc
    Scanner instance which is used in all of the inputs in the reservation system.

  • Constructor Details

    • ReservationSystem

      public ReservationSystem()
      Instantiates an instance of the ReservationSystem class.

  • Method Details

    • createHotel

      public void createHotel(String name)
      Creates a hotel instance with a given name and adds the it to the hotel list.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the hotel that is being created.

    • viewHotel

      public void viewHotel(int index)
      Displays high level and low level information of a hotel. Pre-condition: the hotel index provided exists based from the hotel list and is valid.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the hotel in the hotelList.

    • renameHotel

      public void renameHotel(int index)
      Prompts the user to rename a given hotel. Pre-condition: the hotel index provided exists based from the hotel list and is valid.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the hotel in the hotelList.

    • removeHotel

      public void removeHotel(int index)
      Removes a hotel from the hotel list. Pre-condition: the hotel index provided exists based from the hotel list and is valid.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the hotel in the hotelList.

    • manageHotel

      public void manageHotel(int index)
      Facilitates the 'Manage Hotel' feature of the reservation system. Prompts the user regarding commands that can be ran to manipulate the characteristics of a hotel. Checks the preconditions before running the command. Pre-condition: the hotel index provided exists based from the hotel list and is valid.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the hotel in the hotelList.

    • simulateBooking

      public void simulateBooking(int index)
      Simulates how a user can reserve a room in the chosen hotel. Pre-condition: the hotel index provided exists based from the hotel list and is valid.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the hotel in the hotelList.

    • isExisting

      public int isExisting(String name)
      Determines if the hotel name provided is from an existing hotel and returns its index, -1 otherwise.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the hotel to check.
      Returns:
      the index, or -1 if non-existent

    • runSystem

      public void runSystem()
      Facilitates the process of the reservation system. Prompts the user on commands that can be ran. Checks the necessary conditions for receiving the hotel name as input (hotel names must be unique).

    • getHotelList

      public ArrayList<Hotel> getHotelList()
      Returns the hotel list as an arraylist.
      Returns:
      hotelList, arraylist containing the hotels in the system.
